document_data.name: Razfallow
document_data.mainbody: '''Razfallow''' was a [[half-orc]] assassin from [[Calimshan]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Born from a [[human]] father and an [[orc]] mother, Razfallow grew up to train at the [[Academy of Stealth]] in Calimshan. During this time, he attained leadership of his own team and trained [[Daryth]]. He would have promoted Daryth to be his lieutenant, but the student left the academy in fear.

In the {{YearlinkName|1346}}, he was hired by the evil [[wizard]] [[Cyndre]] in his attempt to take over the [[Moonshae Islands]] after joining the king's council of sorcerers. He slew many members of the royal houses as well as many [[druid]]s of the Isles.

He led a team of assassins to kill [[Tristan Kendrick]], but his father, [[Bryon Kendrick|King Bryon]] sacrificed himself to save the prince. Daryth came to assist the prince and recognized his former trainer. Razfellow was able to escape and return to Cyndre.

He later accompanied the wizard [[Kryphon]] to [[Duncastle]], the forest stronghold of [[Hugh O'Roarke]]. Under the effects of magical ''[[invisibility]]'' and ''[[silence]]'', he disposed of the clerical and magical defenses of the stronghold of Hugh O'Roarke. However, Razfallow was killed by Daryth in the streets of Duncastle.
